Xander Gennarelli

Convert the following binary numbers into hexadecimal.
110101011010
1101 0101 1010
D    5    A
result: D5A

100010001000
1000 1000 1000
8    8    8
result: 888

1100110110011000
1100 1101 1001 1000
C    D    9    8
result: CD98

11111110000100100011
1111 1110 0001 0010 0011
F    E    1    2    3
result: FE123

1000011001010111
1000 0110 0101 0111
8    6    5    7
result: 8657



Convert the following hexadecimal numbers into binary.
ABC
A    B    C
1010 1011 1100
result: 101010111100

1011
1    0    1    1
0001 0000 0001 0001
result: 0001000000010001

2211003347
2    2    1    1    0    0    3    3    4    7
0010 0010 0001 0001 0000 0000 0011 0011 0100 0111
result: 0010001000010001000000000011001101000111

34568DEF
3    4    5    6    8    D    E    F
0000 0100 0101 0110 1000 1101 1110 1111
result: 00000100010101101000110111101111

9ACC
9    A    C    C
1001 1010 1100 1100
result: 1001101011001100
